mapper.sql: select pay.order_id , pay.mem_no , pay.pay_way , pay.pay_dt_comein , pay.pay_yn , pay.pay_ok_date , pay.pay_ok_time , pay.pay_slct , pay.pay_amt , pay.pay_code , pay.chrgr_yn , pay.app_ver , pay.first_pay_yn , pay.card_no , pay.card_nm , pay.phone_no , pay.bank_code , pay.account_no , pay.rcpt_dt , pay.rcpt_nm , pay.store_id , pay.cancel_dt , pay.cancel_state , pay.fail_msg , pay.op_name , pay.bill_id , pay.os , pay.dal_cnt , summary.memCnt as count , summary.paySum as amount , @RNUM := @RNUM + 1 as rowNum from rd_data.tb_payment_succ pay left join (select mem_no, count(mem_no) memCnt, sum(pay_amt) paySum from rd_data.tb_payment_succ group by mem_no) summary on pay.mem_no = summary.mem_no , (select @RNUM := 0) r order by pay_dt_comein desc
